Kaylah Oniwo bụ onye redio Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ejije, onye na-ede blọogụ na onye ngosi
A maara ya ama maka ịkwado 'The Road Show' na 'CATWALK WITH KAYLAH' na Cool FM Nigeria.
A mụrụ Kaylah na Naịjirịa na 22 Jenụwarị

Nna ya bụ onye ọchịagha ndị agha mmiri ebe nne ya bụ onye na-emepụta ejiji. O nwere nzere na Banking na Finance na Mahadum Bowen O nwere asambodo site na Lufodo Academy of Performing Arts (LAPA) na ime ihe nkiri, Stage, Dance na Drama.
Kaylah Oniwo rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa maka ụlọ ọrụ dijitalụ, ma mesịa na 2005 rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ere ahịa maka ụlọ ahịa uwe
Ọ kwadoro 'Campus Square', 'Youth Scene' na ụfọdụ ihe ngosi ndị ọzọ maka Redio Unity Naijiria FM.

Na Cool FM ọ na-akwado 'The Road Show', nke na-amalite n'elekere atọ nke ehihie ruo elekere asaa nke ehihie. Ọ na-akwadokwa ihe ngosi nke ya, 'CATWALK WITH KAYLAH', nke na-ekwu maka ejiji. Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe ngosi Kaylah kwadoro gụnyere:
Kaylah bụ onye nnọchi anya akara maka akara ịma mma Makari. E gosipụtara ya na ụmụ nwanyị isii ndị ọzọ na mkpọsa 'The power of 7' site na akara ọla Bland2Glam
